Uses of Class
com.here.android.mpa.common.GeoPosition

  • Packages that use GeoPosition 
    Package Description
    com.here.android.mpa.common
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations that are generally used by other packages in the Android SDK.
    com.here.android.mpa.ftcr  
    com.here.android.mpa.guidance
    This package includes classes, interfaces, and enumerations related to guidance and turn-by-turn navigation, used by other packages in the APIs for Android SDK.

    • Uses of GeoPosition in com.here.android.mpa.common

      Subclasses of GeoPosition in com.here.android.mpa.common 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MatchedGeoPosition
      An extended GeoPosition class which provides additional position-related information.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.common that return GeoPosition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoPosition PositioningManager.getLastKnownPosition()
      Returns the last known (cached) position from the best available provider.
      GeoPosition PositioningManager.getPosition()
      Gets the GeoPosition for the current PositioningManager.LocationMethod if available.
      GeoPosition PositionSimulator.getPosition(int index)
      GeoPosition from the currently playing position log file for the given index.
      GeoPosition MatchedGeoPosition.getRawPosition()
      Obtains the raw position from which the given map-matched position was generated.
      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.common with parameters of type GeoPosition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PositioningManager.OnPositionChangedListener.onPositionUpdated(PositioningManager.LocationMethod method, GeoPosition position, boolean isMapMatched)
      A callback indicating that the position has been updated.

    • Uses of GeoPosition in com.here.android.mpa.ftcr

      Methods in com.here.android.mpa.ftcr that return GeoPosition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoPosition FTCRNavigationManager.getRoutePosition()
      Returns matched route position for current navigation session, can be null if current gps position can not be matched.
